name: Kilwyntiga
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
tide festivals and nightly votive offerings
diet heavy on smoked fish, seaweed and salted stores
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned; ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: Near-medieval to early-industrial baseline; limited combustion industry
Unclear state affiliation; local authorities and guilds hold real power
